Entries.give_pendant: So, our journey has led us here.#$b#...$1#$b#I shall miss the sea...$1#$b#Though I feel your farm will have a charm I could love as well.  Starting with you.$4#$b#I shall speak with {{LewisSubF}} about our celebration.  In three days time, our paths will be one.$4

Entries.summer_9.001: My back has been hurting, nurse... you know, with all the hunching over to write my novel.
My back has been hurting, Magnus... you know, with all the hunching over to write my novel.
